titleInfo.title: Printed letter No.6A from Lieutenant-Colonel Lewis Pelly, Acting Political Resident, Persian Gulf, Bushire to Henry Lacon Anderson, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter contains Pelly's arguments for relocating the residency to Cassab [Kha≈üab] on the Mussondoom [Musandam] Promontory, focusing on trade, relationships with local chiefs and support for the agencies in the area.Also included are Pelly's thoughts on the situation in Oman under the new Sultan, trade in Persia, in-depth analysis of the Caravan trade, the location of the Telegraph and Steamers in Kuwait and the Telegraph, Coal Depots and Political Residencies throughout the Gulf.
